content: angelique named in honour of my crochet angels who sit on my shoulder and whisper ideas to me angelique is a free afghan square pattern designed as part of the friends around the world crochet a long 2020 friends around the world cal is hosted by the facebook group cal crochet a long you can read all about the cal here 1 it is a collaboration of many designers from all over the world who have each designed one or two squares and i am honoured to be a part of this cal 12 square - aran/worsted yarn - 5mm hook approx 173m/189yds 10 square - double knit yarn - 4mm hook approx 127m/139yds 1 https //l facebook com/l php u=https%3a%2f%2fcalcrochetalong com%2ffriends-around-the-world-2020-fatw5%2f%3ffbclid%3diwar3fppoyvd4wcmc59u9x5p9udcudl8mhwyorp3b5nnqm4tx8om0p8j_feoy&h=at2gkmpggjunbohmovwtqb8xhovgdfa2gjsrdo5zcrma1ndk2e9-rlzgrtfonkwynb0jar6buzb77ssgsb6o_sdpczymfsb2azvrhy-56kmnqrzqok-hsd9ui8gdkziwauslydne_6vhpzezheaz2a
